transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Evasion
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Evasion
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Ruthless Onslaught
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> proportional to the caster's Defense.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Grants barrier to all allies (proportional to Defense)

description: Attacks an enemy, and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000077_1_1] turn(s)</color> proportional to the caster's Defense.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Exile
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) Grants increased Defense to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> enemies take additional fixed damage equal to Kappa's Defense.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack.
description: (Triggered Effect) Grants increased Defense to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000077_2_5] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> enemies take additional fixed damage equal to Kappa's Defense.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack.

5: Damage dealt increases proportional to target's missing Health

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Desert's Wrath
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Removes <color=#28d9ed>all</color> buffs and debuffs from the caster and target, and attacks an enemy.\nWhen the enemy is <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> element or <color=#28d9ed>killed</color>, activates <color=#28d9ed>Exile</color>.\nDamage dealt greatly increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack.
description: Removes <color=#28d9ed>all</color> buffs and debuffs from the caster and target, and attacks an enemy.\nWhen the enemy is <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> element or <color=#28d9ed>killed</color>, activates <color=#28d9ed>Exile</color>.\nDamage dealt greatly increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack.

5: Damage dealt increases proportional to target's missing Health

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Skill Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Skill Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000077_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
